actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to button blanks of casein.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend duty-free treatment for casein button blanks. Retains the current tariff on button blanks other than casein button blanks. Makes the column one duty on such button blanks subject to any rate reductions that were scheduled before enactment of this Act. Deletes the duty for least developed developing countries (LDDC duty) if the column one duty is reduced to the same level as the LDDC duty. Requires the amendments made by this Act to be considered trade agreement obligations for purposes of the Trade Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to button blanks of casein.
